model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board is the array in which the characters and objects are placed. Attributes include:
    • int[][] arr The array that will represent the board
    • int BOARDHEIGHT - The default height of the board
    • int BOARDWIDTH - The default width of the board
    • int limit - tool used to set fresh water and salt water zones
    Author:
    Group 1

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        This is a constructor for the Board class.

        It creates a 2d array based on the boardheight and boardwidth. It initializes the values in the array to a series of 1's and -1's.

    • Method Detail

      • getTile

        public int getTile(int x,
                   int y)
        This method returns a part of the array given a coordinate
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the specified tile
        y - The y coordinate of the specified tile
        Returns:
        String the specified file.

      • southWind

        public void southWind()
        This method simulates south wind on the game board.

        This method rearranges the 2d array so that it pushes the "Fresh water" down.

      • northWind

        public void northWind()
        This method simulates north wind on the game board.

        This method rearranges the 2d array so that it pushes the "Salt water" up.

      • getArr

        public int[][] getArr()
        This method is a getter for the 2d array

        Returns the 2d array "arr"

        Returns:
        int[][]

      • setArr

        public void setArr(int[][] arr)
        This method is a setter for the 2d array

        Parameters:
        arr - The array you would like to set as the board's "arr" property (int[][])
